verses.text: And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* unto him all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* with him, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, both \w small|strong="H6996"\w* and \w great|strong="H1419"\w*: and he \w read|strong="H7121"\w* in their \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* which was \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 23.2  t both…: Heb. from small even unto great *

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* by a \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w*, and \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and his \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* with all \add their\add* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* and all \add their\add* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, to \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that were \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in this \w book|strong="H5612"\w*. And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* to the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the second \w order|strong="H4932"\w*, and the \w keepers|strong="H8104"\w* of the \w door|strong="H5592"\w*, to bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* all the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that were \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, and for the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*, and for all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*: and he \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* them \w without|strong="H2351"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* in the \w fields|strong="H7709"\w* of \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ashes|strong="H6083"\w* of them unto \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*.

And he put \w down|strong="H7673"\w* the idolatrous \w priests|strong="H3649"\w*, whom the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w ordained|strong="H5414"\w* to burn \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* in the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and in the places round \w about|strong="H4524"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; them also that burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* unto \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, to the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, and to the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*, and to the \w planets|strong="H4208"\w*, and to all the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*.\f + \fr 23.5 \ft put…: Heb. caused to cease\f*\f + \fr 23.5 \ft idolatrous…: Heb. Chemarim\f*\f + \fr 23.5 \ft planets: or, twelve signs or, constellations\f*

And he brought \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w* from the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w without|strong="H2351"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, unto the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* it at the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*, and stamped \add it\add* \w small|strong="H1854"\w* to \w powder|strong="H6083"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* the \w powder|strong="H6083"\w* thereof upon the \w graves|strong="H6913"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And he brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w sodomites|strong="H6945"\w*, that \add were\add* by the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, where the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w wove|strong="H0707"\w* \w hangings|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*.\f + \fr 23.7 \ft hangings: Heb. houses\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* all the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* out of the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* where the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* had burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w*, from \w Geba|strong="H1387"\w* to \w Beer-sheba|strong="H0884"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* that \add were\add* in the entering \w in|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w governor|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, which \add were\add* on a \w man’s|strong="H0376"\w* left \w hand|strong="H8040"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Nevertheless the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* came not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, but they did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of the unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.

And he \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w* \w Topheth|strong="H8612"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hinnom|strong="H2011"\w*, that no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* might make his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* or his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* to pass \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* to \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*.

And he took \w away|strong="H7673"\w* the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* that the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, at the entering \w in|strong="H0935"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, by the \w chamber|strong="H3957"\w* of \w Nathan-melech|strong="H5419"\w* the \w chamberlain|strong="H5631"\w*, which \add was\add* in the \w suburbs|strong="H6503"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the \w chariots|strong="H4818"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft chamberlain: or, eunuch, or, officer\f*

And the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* that \add were\add* on the \w top|strong="H1406"\w* of the upper \w chamber|strong="H5944"\w* of \w Ahaz|strong="H0271"\w*, which the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* which \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, did the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* beat \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and brake \add them\add* \w down|strong="H7323"\w* from thence, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* of them into the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Kidron|strong="H6939"\w*.\f + \fr 23.12 \ft brake…: or, ran from thence\f*

And the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* that \add were\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, which \add were\add* on the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* of \w corruption|strong="H4889"\w*, which \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w builded|strong="H1129"\w* for \w Ashtoreth|strong="H6253"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* of the \w Zidonians|strong="H6722"\w*, and for \w Chemosh|strong="H3645"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8251"\w* of the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w*, and for \w Milcom|strong="H4445"\w* the \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, did the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w*.\f + \fr 23.13 \ft the mount…: that is, the mount of Olives\f*

And he brake in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* the \w images|strong="H4676"\w*, and cut \w down|strong="H3772"\w* the \w groves|strong="H0842"\w*, and \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* their \w places|strong="H4725"\w* with the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 23.14 \ft images: Heb. statues\f*

¶ Moreover the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* that \add was\add* at \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, \add and\add* the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* which \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, who made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*, had \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, both that \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w* he brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the high \w place|strong="H1116"\w*, \add and\add* \w stamped|strong="H1854"\w* \add it\add* small to \w powder|strong="H6083"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the \w grove|strong="H0842"\w*.

And as \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* himself, he \w spied|strong="H7200"\w* the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w* that \add were\add* there in the \w mount|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* out of the \w sepulchres|strong="H6913"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \add them\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w polluted|strong="H2930"\w* it, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w*, who \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* these \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w title|strong="H6725"\w* \add is\add* \w that|strong="H1975"\w* that I \w see|strong="H7200"\w*? And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w told|strong="H0559"\w* him, \add It is\add* the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w came|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w* that thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* against the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let him \w alone|strong="H3240"\w*; let no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w move|strong="H5128"\w* his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*. So they let his \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w alone|strong="H4422"\w*, with the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* that came \w out|strong="H0935"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.\f + \fr 23.18 \ft bones alone: Heb. bones to escape\f*

And all the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* also of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, which the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* to provoke \add the \+nd Lord\+nd*\add* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*, \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* took \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, and \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to them according to all the \w acts|strong="H4639"\w* that he had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*.

And he \w slew|strong="H2076"\w* all the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* that \add were\add* there upon the \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w men’s|strong="H0120"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* upon them, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.\f + \fr 23.20 \ft slew: or, sacrificed\f*

¶ And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Keep|strong="H6213"\w* the \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, as \add it is\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of this \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

Surely there was not \w holden|strong="H6213"\w* such a \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* from the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* that \w judged|strong="H8199"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, nor in all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, nor of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*;

But in the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, \add wherein\add* this \w passover|strong="H6453"\w* was \w holden|strong="H6213"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

¶ Moreover the \add workers with\add* familiar \w spirits|strong="H0178"\w*, and the \w wizards|strong="H3049"\w*, and the \w images|strong="H8655"\w*, and the \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, and all the \w abominations|strong="H8251"\w* that were \w spied|strong="H7200"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* and in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, did \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* put \w away|strong="H1197"\w*, that he might \w perform|strong="H6965"\w* the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* which were \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* that \w Hilkiah|strong="H2518"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 23.24 \ft images: or, teraphim\f*

And like unto him was there no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, that \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with all his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and with all his \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and with all his \w might|strong="H3966"\w*, according to all the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*; neither \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* there \add any\add* like him.

¶ Notwithstanding the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* not from the \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* of his \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*, wherewith his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, because of all the \w provocations|strong="H3708"\w* that \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* had \w provoked|strong="H3707"\w* him withal.\f + \fr 23.26 \ft provocations: Heb. angers\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* also out of my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, as I have \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and will cast \w off|strong="H3988"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* which I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of which I \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, My \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall be there.

Now the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, and all that he \w did|strong="H6213"\w*, \add are\add* they not \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*?

¶ In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Pharaoh-nechoh|strong="H6549"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w* to the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*: and \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* him; and he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him at \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, when he had \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* him.

And his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* carried him in a \w chariot|strong="H7392"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* from \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in his own \w sepulchre|strong="H6900"\w*. And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him, and made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in his \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* stead.

¶ \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. And his \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Hamutal|strong="H2537"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* of \w Libnah|strong="H3841"\w*.\f + \fr 23.31 \ft Jehoahaz: also called, Shallum\f*

And he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, according to all that his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w Pharaoh-nechoh|strong="H6549"\w* put him in \w bands|strong="H0631"\w* at \w Riblah|strong="H7247"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, that he might not \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*; and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to a \w tribute|strong="H6066"\w* of an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and a \w talent|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.\f + \fr 23.33 \ft that…: or, because he reigned\f*\f + \fr 23.33 \ft put the…: Heb. set a fine upon the land\f*

And \w Pharaoh-nechoh|strong="H6549"\w* made \w Eliakim|strong="H0471"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in the room of \w Josiah|strong="H2977"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* to \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jehoahaz|strong="H3059"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*: and he \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w* there.

And \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* to \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*; but he \w taxed|strong="H6186"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* according to the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: he \w exacted|strong="H5065"\w* the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, of every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* according to his \w taxation|strong="H6187"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* unto \w Pharaoh-nechoh|strong="H6549"\w*.

¶ \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \add was\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*; and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w eleven|strong="H0259"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.
